body.name: AOC Gaming 24G2S 24” Frameless Gaming Monitor, Full HD 1920x1080, 165Hz 1ms, Adaptive-Sync, Height Adjustable Stand, Black
features: 24-inch (23.8-inch viewable) G2 series gaming monitor with 1920x1080 Full HD resolution VA panel and minimal bezels.

Lightning-fast 165Hz refresh rate (via DisplayPort 1.2) and rapid 1ms MPRT response time lets you target moving opponents with precision, putting you ahead of the game. Fast-moving action and dramatic transitions will be rendered smoothly without the effects of ghosting.
Adaptive-Sync ensures ultra-smooth, tear-free team fights for flawless skill shots and stutter-free loading times.
125.95% sRGB color gamut brings characters to life and creates stunning imagery with dynamic color range, rich details, and diverse contrast for full immersion.
AOC Low Input Lag Mode delivers a lag-free display for higher resolution and maximizes in-game responsiveness, giving the player an edge over the competition.
The 178/178 degree extra wide viewing angle prevents the shifting of colors when viewed from an offset angle, so you always get consistent colors.
Flicker-free for your well being during extended gaming sessions
Robust connectivity options include HDMI 1.4 x2, DisplayPort 1.2 x1, VGA x1 and audio out x1 for maximum convenience.

The ergonomic (height adjust, pivot, swivel, & tilt) stand with quick release function is VESA compatible. It offers the most optimum viewing angle and promotes a more healthy posture during long gaming campaigns.

Enjoy better console gaming. AGON by AOC gaming monitors are designed to maximize the performance of your consoles by unleashing up to 120Hz frame rate (exact performance depends on consoles) and ultra low latency, giving you an edge over your opponents.
body.description: Unleash your potential and win sweet victories with the AOC 24G2S gaming monitor- a sleek battle station with FHD resolution, 165Hz lightning-fast refresh rate and 1ms MPRT rapid response time. With Adaptive-Sync, you get low latency, high refresh rates, and incredibly smooth graphics that react instantly to what’s happening on screen. Maximize the performance of your consoles by unleashing up to 120Hz frame rate (exact performance depends on consoles) and ultra low latency, giving you an edge over your opponents. Thanks to the 178/178 degree extra-wide viewing angle, you can witness consistent colors on the 23.8-inch VA panel from a wide range of viewing angles, with up to 125.95% sRGB area coverage. The included stand is pivot, swivel and tilt adjustable to provide each user with an optimal viewing angle, more comfortable for extended gaming and computing sessions. The monitor is also VESA compatible, allowing you to quickly change to another type of mounting solution. At AOC, we design great products that meet our customers’ needs in a sustainable and responsible way. Our entire lineup is Mercury-free, ROHS-compliant, and made from conflict-free materials. Our packaging now includes less plastic, less ink, and more paper. To learn more about our full commitment to a greener future, visit Environment Policy | AOC Monitors.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Unleash your potential The 24G2S completes your gaming experience with a beautiful VA panel, Adaptive Sync technology, and a narrow border design offering minimal bezel distraction for optimal game play. This monitor allows you to play your favorite games at a fast 165Hz refresh rate and a 1ms response time. Playing games while encapsulated by world class colors will make your gaming experience truly unforgettable. Key Features 23.8” with 1920x1080 Full HD Resolution VA panel for wide-viewing angles and world class colors Rapid 1ms Response Time (MPRT) and 165Hz Refresh Rate VGA, Display Port 1.2 and 2 x HDMI 1.4 connections No stuttering or tearing with Adaptive Sync technology Sleek, frameless design with height, swivel, tilt adjustability FlickerFree and AOC LowBlue Mode Technology

Fast refresh rate A 165Hz refresh rate, well over twice the industry standard of 60Hz, makes games run smooth as silk. Realize the potential in your graphics card. Forget screen tearing and forget motion blur. Feel your reflexes become one with the action. Never look back. VA panel for optimal viewing VA panel ensures an excellent viewing experience with lifelike yet brilliant and accurate colors. Colors look consistent no matter from which angle you look at the display. Quick response time A pixel response time of 1ms means speed without the smear for an enhanced experience. Fast-moving action and dramatic transitions will be rendered smoothly without the effects of ghosting.

Low Input Lag mode Unleash your reflexes by switching to the AOC Low Input Lag mode. Forget graphical frills: this mode rewires the monitor in favor of raw response time, giving the ultimate edge in hair trigger stand offs. Smooth game-play Adaptive Sync aligns your monitor’s vertical refresh rate with the frame rate delivered by your GPU, making your gameplay and casual gaming experience even more fluid by eliminating stuttering, tearing and judder. This feature is also useful when enjoying videos and other visual media, for a smoother entertainment. Height adjustable stand Having the ability to adjust the height of your monitor is a necessity for gamers. This monitor also allows you to pivot, swivel, tilt, and is Vesa mountable. Play games at a comfortable level designed just for you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great budget 4k Ultra Wide 144 hz monitor
reviews.reviewText: Was it bit skeptical on purchasing this monitor but the flash discount on it was too good to pass up on. I'm glad I bought it.It's a lot larger than I expected. Unit came in an extremely large box and packaging. I really liked how the instructions were printed on the box as you open it. Colors were bright and had no dead pixels on arrival - I left the settings on default. I really don't game as much - I mostly watch video content and do server scripting for a friend - so I can't really give a review on AAA gaming experience.The stand is greatly designed - it can rotating sideways and tilt about 45 angle both ways. It's height adjustable as well.My only con about the monitor is how the plastic rear shroud seems kind of loose. May be it's how the unit is designed but my old LG Ultrawide rear shroud seemed more sturdy.Overall, I'd highly recommend this monitor for consumers since the price is affordable. The quality is good and unit so far performs flawlessly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Monitor but no 4 port USB as pictured
reviews.reviewText: I bought 2 of these at the same time and they both came undamaged and in perfect working condition. I am very happy with my purchase. I bought them as an upgrade to an older AOC 2476wm and a Vizio 720p HDTV that I was using as a secondary monitor. The colours are crisp and vibrant. A great deal if your looking to upgrade to dual monitors. The only downside it they DO NOT have the "4 USB" ports. kind of a bummer Pros: Price, quality, design, 2 HDMI ports and aux out Cons: No USB ports

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is an amazing monitor for my Mac mini m1. (34 inch IPS AOC U34G3X)
reviews.reviewText: This is an amazing monitor for my Mac mini m1 (34 inch IPS AOC U34G3X).First it comes with both a HDMI and DP cable. I used the HDMI cable to hook to my m1 mini and it goes up to 100hz refresh rate which is great, I tried 3 others cables to see if it was possible to get to any higher and none of them worked higher than 100hz. If you are going to use this with HDMI just stick with the included cable or one you already have.I also bought a USB-C to DisplayPort cable that gets me to 144hz just fine. Not ideal having to take one thunderbolt port away doing this, but the included usb-c connectors on the monitor partially make up for this.I love the fact that it has 4 USB ports, 2 are labeled as quick charge. I found that I could plug in two unpowered USB hubs into the quick charge ports and they work fine for low power devices like my keyboard, mouse, webcam, security keys etc.. haven’t tried something like a hard drive plugged into them.The two additional ports seem to be faster than the quick charge ones, I ended up plugging in my 1TB SSD drive that goes to around 9XX MB/s read and write when connected via USB-C to my thunderbolt. When plugged in the monitor it gets around 38X MB/s read and write which is respectable though not as fast as the thunderbolt. When I tried the quick charge ports for the SSD it’s so slow not to be useable so I’ll stick to using those for devices that don’t require speed. My other ports on my computer are all occupied and at best I could plug it into a USB hub plugged into a USB-A port but that makes the drive about 250 MB/s write and 200 read, so plugging it in the monitor was the best choice. Even removing the hub as a test and plugging the drive directly to a Mac USB-A gets the same speed, so oddly enough through my monitor makes is run faster compared to the Mac USB-A.The stand is amazing the amount of degrees of freedom it allows to move the monitor and switched to using it despite having an arm that works with this monitor.The picture quality is amazing though colors in certain situations with HDR mode on look off, but in general I appreciate how this mode colors everything compared to normal. I use an app called BetterDisplay to tweak the monitor settings further than MacOS X allows including custom HIDPI modes that scale everything to an ideal size that isn’t too small or too big.It also comes with monitor quality speakers which as usual are of low quality, but at least are loud enough to not worry about being too quiet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I use this as a second monitor for work. Very handy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easily the best UWHD monitor at this price point
reviews.reviewText: I was skeptical of this at first as it wasn't a heavily adopted model and reviews were limited. I can say after almost a year of owning this it is by far the best monitor I have owned. The bezels on this are phenomenal and the overall build quality is great. As for the display quality, in comparison to similar Asus and Samsung monitors I own, this one easily outperforms them for Gaming and daily activities. The Samsung UWHD monitors are still better for movies and digital production work, but the price point is almost double in comparison to this one.No dead pixels, ghosting, LED bleeding, etc. after almost a year. Don't sleep on this monitor, if you are on the fence, buy it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars One of the better VA panels I have seen.
reviews.reviewText: No dead pixels, no issues, monitor was very well packaged.VA panel inky-blacks are definitely appreciated. Colours are vibrant without being over-saturated. There was a bit of dark smearing / ghosting, but setting overdrive to the middle setting resolved this when playing >144 FPS.For the price, this thing is great. There is really nothing to complain about.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I got this as a birthday gift and he loves it. He plays his game everyday and he loves it. Really good quality and lighting on the screen as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Tengo que decir que al inicio no tenia mucha confianza pero con algunos meses utilizando este modelo tengo que decir que es uno de los mejores y por otra parte tiene un excelente panel.

Zero complaints about using it for school and work. I also stream hockey games on it and the picture looks great. I haven't used it for any gaming though so I can't speak to that, but if you want to use it as I have then it's a good buy.

reviews.reviewTitle: Not able to put the video
reviews.reviewText: at the bottom of the screen there is a line that won't go away.

reviews.reviewTitle: La calidad de imagen es muy buena
reviews.reviewText: Es muy cómodo de usar, al girar y regular la posición del monitor. Al ser IPS tiene unos colores y calidad increíble. Me encantó

Sin duda una excelente compra. Lo que yo buscaba era un monitor con compatibilidad G-Sync y este lo tenía. Los 165 Hz sí los da, nada más es de configurar tu pc en ajustes avanzados de pantalla. En la caja trae el monitor, cable de corriente, cable HDMI, cable Displayport y base para el monitor. Cuenta con Game Mode desde los ajustes del monitor (FPS, Carreras y uno para juegos de estrategia), también tiene una función HDR, aunque en los ajustes de la pantalla de la pc no detecte que el monitor es HDR; creo que utiliza un sistema de parpadeo de píxeles para generar colores que no tiene (activar eso desactiva el game mode si lo tienes activado). También tiene modo eco y un filtro azul para cuidar la vista. Yo recomiendo descargar el software de AOC que se llama G-Menu, desde ahí puedes activar el game mode, el hdr, el filtro azul y la resolución, así como 165 Hz sin meterte a la configuración de la pantalla de la pc. Sinceramente estoy muy contento con el monitor. Otro punto a destacar es que los bordes son delgados y se ve muy limpia la imagen.
El monitor está excelente, estéticamente es muy bonito aunque la mayoría es plástico, la imágen se ve muy bien, el modo hdr está fantástico, tiene 2 entradas hdmi, 1 vga y 1 displayport
